about_the_game:
The new entry in the Wally The Seal series arrives! You were able to escape the mazes last time, but your second go around won't be so easy! 

In Wally The Seal 2, your objective is to find and collect 4 mysterious flowers from each of the levels. Use the new Salmon Radar to track the flowers while avoiding Wally The Seal and his partner Mrs. Wally. 

Features

  • Large maps to explore with powerups to gather

  • The Salmon Radar item will show you your proximity to each of the 4 flowers you must collect when in range.

  • Straightforward gameplay of collecting items while avoiding threats

  • A penguin wearing a fedora

The Seals

  • The wall phasing Wally The Seal is here once again! But he seems angrier than usual? Wally will now alternate between being docile and enraged. When he becomes enraged, his speed will increase proportionally to the amount of flowers you have collected!

  • Mrs. Wally makes her debut! She only moves when you're not looking at her and will become faster the longer you neglect her attention.

  • Perhaps other surprises await you this time as well?

name: Wally The Seal 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-i7 Intel Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 20 Series GPU or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i9 Intel Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 30-40 Series GPU or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Wally The Seal is back! And this time he's not alone. Armed with the new Salmon Radar, explore all new maps with new items to find and collect. Can you survive the combined might of Wally and his partner Mrs. Wally?
